statements: SELECT * FROM WasteManagementCustomers;
SELECT customer_name, billing_address FROM WasteManagementCustomers;
SELECT customer_name, service_request_type FROM WasteManagementCustomers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementCustomers WHERE service_request_type = 'Pickup';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, service_request_date FROM WasteManagementCustomers ORDER BY service_request_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementCustomers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, billing_address FROM WasteManagementCustomers WHERE service_request_type = 'Recycling';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, service_request_type FROM WasteManagementCustomers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementCustomers WHERE service_request_type = 'Garbage' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, service_request_date FROM WasteManagementCustomers WHERE service_request_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, billing_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM service_requests;
SELECT request_id, request_date, request_details FROM service_requests WHERE request_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, billing_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, request_date, request_details FROM customers JOIN service_requests ON customers.customer_id = service_requests.customer_id WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, billing_address, phone_number, request_date FROM customers JOIN service_requests ON customers.customer_id = service_requests.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, billing_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, request_date FROM customers JOIN service_requests ON customers.customer_id = service_requests.customer_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, billing_details.bill_amount FROM customers JOIN billing_details ON customers.customer_id = billing_details.customer_id WHERE bill_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, billing_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customers.customer_name, billing_amount FROM customers JOIN billing_details ON customers.customer_id = billing_details.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, request_date, request_details FROM service_requests WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, bill_date FROM customers JOIN billing_details ON customers.customer_id = billing_details.customer_id WHERE bill_amount > 1000 ORDER BY bill_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT billing_date, amount FROM billing_details WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY billing_date ASC;
SELECT request_id, request_description FROM service_requests WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;

SELECT customers.customer_name, billing_details.amount, service_requests.request_description FROM customers INNER JOIN billing_details ON customers.customer_id = billing_details.customer_id INNER JOIN service_requests ON customers.customer_id = service_requests.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN billing_details ON customers.customer_id = billing_details.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT service_name, COUNT(request_id) AS total_requests FROM service_types INNER JOIN service_requests ON service_types.service_id = service_requests.customer_id GROUP BY service_name ORDER BY total_requests DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Ave';
SELECT * FROM billing_details ORDER BY bill_date DESC;
SELECT bin_id, location, service_type FROM waste_bins WHERE size = 'Large';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customers.customer_name, billing_details.bill_amount, billing_details.bill_date FROM customers JOIN billing_details ON customers.customer_id = billing_details.customer_id;
SELECT waste_bins.location, waste_bins.size, collection_schedule.collection_day FROM waste_bins JOIN collection_schedule ON waste_bins.bin_id = collection_schedule.bin_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, service_requests.request_details, service_requests.request_date FROM customers JOIN service_requests ON customers.customer_id = service_requests.customer_id WHERE service_requests.request_date > '2022-01-01';
